Programmer's Hierarchical Interactive Graphics System (PHIGS)

Available Test Suites

The PHIGS test suites are available as a compressed tar file (Fortran or C).
File sizes, in megabytes:
 
Fortran  C
compressed 2.5 3.6
uncompressed 8.7 13.2
Of course this is the size of the documentation and source code only; when you compile the code, the executables will take up more space.

The version available is version 2.2.  This contains tests for interactive modeling and error handling.

Overview of PVT system

Download PVT from FTP site
